Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace Coop.Mod.Persistence.RPC

Classes

ArgumentFactory

Factory to create the transfer wrapper for an argument in a RPC call.

ArgumentSerializer

Serializer for Argument. It's important to keep in mind, that the serialized payload may never exceed !

EventBroadcastingQueue

Queue to broadcast events. Sends all events in order and makes sure, that all event arguments can be resolved on the clients. This includes waiting for any pending large object transfers.

EventBroadcastingQueue.Call

EventMethodCall

RailEvent used to initiate remote procedure calls. The way this event is processed differs between client and server:

  • The server acts as a broadcasting relay station. Effectively receiving the event and forwarding it to all clients (INCLUDING the client that sent the event!). Note that the server will delay event execution until all arguments have been transferred to all clients.
  • Clients will resolve the call and arguments locally and execute it.

MethodCallSerializer

Railgun encoders and decoders for the remote procedure calls.

MethodCallSyncHandler

Registers a global call handler for a MethodAccess that sends an EventMethodCall to the server.

MethodCallSyncHandler.Statistics

PendingRequests

RPCSyncHandlers

Manages a collection of MethodCallSyncHandler.

Structs

Argument

Type union for arguments to a RPC.

MethodCall

Represents a serializable call to a method including all invocation arguments. Method pointer, instance and arguments have to resolved before execution. In order to resolve a method call refer to MethodRegistry and ArgumentFactory.

MethodCallSyncHandler.Statistics.Trace

Interfaces

IClientAccess

Interface to access a clients persistence state.

EventArgType
